# WebGL with 1 Million points 

```{r}
library(plotly)

n <- 1e6
x <- rnorm(n)
y <- 2*x + rnorm(n, sd = 5)

fig <- plot_ly(x = x, y = y, alpha  = 0.01)
fig <- fig %>% toWebGL()

fig
```
